bibl.title: The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Volume L (Nos 3522-3600) W.E.H. Cockle, R.A. Coles, E.W. Handley, M.W. Haslam, E. Lobel, H. Maehler, P.J. Parsons, T.S. Pattie, J.R. Rea, C.H. Roberts, J.L. Rowlandson, T.C. Skeat, J.D. Thomas, E.G. Turner, J.E.G. Whitehorne

series.title: Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Romans Memoirs. No.

bibl.seg: Bowman A.K., H.M. Cockle, W.E.H. Cockle, R.A. Coles, E.W. Handley, M.W. Haslam, E. Lobel, H. Maehler, P.J. Parsons, T.S. Pattie, J.R. Rea, C.H. Roberts, J.L. Rowlandson, T.C. Skeat, J.D. Thomas, E.G. Turner, J.E.G. Whitehorne, The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Volume L (Nos 3522-3600). (Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Romans Memoirs. No. 70.)
London, Egypt Exploration Society, 1983, 8°, xv-285 pp., 1 portrait, 1 plan et XX pll., dont 2 dépli.

C.R. par Giuliana Foti Talamanca, Iura 34 (1983) pp. 241-252. - Jean Irigoin, REG 97 (1984) pp. 555-556. - Wolfgang Luppe, CR N.S., 35 (1985) pp. 355-359. - Georges Nachtergael, ChrEg 61 (1986) No. 121, pp. 156-163. - Maryline Parca, BASP 23 (1986) pp. 161-167. - Hans-Albert Rupprecht, ZSav 102 (1985) pp. 518-522.
